publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-4609 Hugh O’Donnell: NHS Lanarkshire Youth Counselling Service—That the Parliament congratulates the NHS Lanarkshire Youth Counselling Service for its work with young people in North Lanarkshire; recognises the important contribution made by the service in supporting young people with varying emotional and psychological issues by providing non-judgemental, objective and independent counselling, and hopes that this success is continued as the service is introduced into South Lanarkshire schools. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Jim Tolson*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-4609 NHS Lanarkshire Youth Counselling Service (lodged on 17 July 2009) Pauline McNeill*, Stuart McMillan*, Elaine Smith*, Mike Pringle*, Christina McKelvie*, Jack McConnell*, Jim Hume*, Gil Paterson*
